text: The 1984–85 LEN European Cup is the 22nd edition of LEN's premier competition for men's water polo clubs. ==Group stage== {| class="wikitable" |- !Key to colors in group tables |- style="background:#cfc;" |Group winners and runners- up advanced to the Semi-finals |} ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ==Semi-finals== ==Finals== ==See also== *1984–85 LEN Cup Winners' Cup Category:LEN Champions League seasons Category:1984 in water polo Category:1985 in water polo
title: 1984–85 European Cup (water polo)
